name: NZXT H710 Mid-Tower ATX Case
desc: The NZXT H710 is a sleek and spacious mid-tower ATX case with excellent cable management.
features: Brand: NZXT, Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, EATX, mATX, ITX

reviews.content: Plenty of room for easy building and cable routing.
Clean and minimalist design with tempered glass side panel.

name: Corsair 4000D Airflow Mid-Tower Case
desc: The Corsair 4000D Airflow is a stylish mid-tower case optimized for cooling performance.
features: Brand: Corsair, Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, mATX, ITX

reviews.content: Cable management is a breeze with the included ties.

name: Fractal Design Meshify C Compact ATX Case
desc: The Fractal Design Meshify C is a compact ATX case with high airflow and a tempered glass side panel.
features: Brand: Fractal Design, Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, mATX, ITX

reviews.content: Compact size without sacrificing cable management.

name: Phanteks Eclipse P400A Digital RGB Mid-Tower Case
desc: The Phanteks Eclipse P400A is a mid-tower case with a front mesh panel for optimal airflow and digital RGB lighting.
features: Brand: Phanteks, Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, mATX, ITX

reviews.content: Attractive RGB lighting effects with customizable patterns.
Well-ventilated case for cool component temperatures.

name: Cooler Master MasterBox TD500 Mesh Mid-Tower Case
desc: The Cooler Master MasterBox TD500 Mesh features a mesh front panel for optimized airflow and an aesthetic design.
features: Brand: Cooler Master, Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, mATX, ITX

reviews.content: Good value for a case with mesh front panel.
Efficient cooling with included pre-installed fans.
